section.heading: District retirement benefits program.
section.text: The retirement benefits program of the District shall consist of:

para.text: A defined benefit plan, as provided in 42 U.S.C. § 301 et seq. (“Social Security Act”);
An employee deferred compensation plan pursuant to § 457 of the Internal Revenue Code [26 U.S.C. § 457] governed by Chapter 36 of Title 47; and
A defined contribution plan pursuant to § 401(a) of the Internal Revenue Code [26 U.S.C. § 401].

annoGroup.heading: History
annoGroup.annotation: as added Oct. 1, 1987, D.C. Law 7-27, § 2(g), 34 DCR 5079

annoGroup.heading: References in Text
annoGroup.text: Section 457 of the Internal Revenue Code, referred to in paragraph (2), is codified as 26 U.S.C. § 457.
Section 401(a) of the Internal Revenue Code, referred to in paragraph (3), is classified as 26 U.S.C. § 401(a).
